forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 21C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 68F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A clear sky. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 21C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 69F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thundershowers following a period of rain early. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing late. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thundershowers in the morning, then cloudy with rain likely in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers in the morning will give way to steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 46F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High near 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.
